Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at Racine/74th
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th, Loomis, (Continued across 74th), and Racine due to, street blockage near Racine/74th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th, Loomis, (Continued across 74th), and Racine due to, street blockage near Racine/74th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Fullerton
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Fullerton due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Fullerton due to police activity. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
